SCRIPT.MSCRI:
!Publish the authentication token generated :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# <> "" : IF &VALUE# <> "" : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_OPS_TOKEN_ID" : SET &UC4RB_OPS_TOKEN_ID# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPS_TOKEN_ID#,,"TOP" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_OPS_TOKEN_ID# = "" :ENDIF
